entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
